chart_description: This chart displays the virtual memory size of processes associated with applications running on the system.

dimension_descriptions.containers: Displays the virtual memory size of containers associated with applications.
dimension_descriptions.go.d.plugin: Displays the virtual memory size of the Go.d plugin.
dimension_descriptions.kube-proxy: Displays the virtual memory size of the kube-proxy process.
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: Displays the virtual memory size of the kubelet process.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Displays the virtual memory size of the Netdata monitoring tool.
dimension_descriptions.other: Displays the virtual memory size of other processes associated with applications.
dimension_descriptions.sql: Displays the virtual memory size of SQL databases associated with applications.
dimension_descriptions.system: Displays the virtual memory size of system processes associated with applications.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: Displays the virtual memory size of the tc-qos-helper process.
